item.title: 奇货可居：如何为后美元世界做好准备（播客）
item.description: 人们总是谈论历史上可能出现的巨大转折点。一段时间以来，人们一直在谈论美国有可能失去其在国际金融秩序中的主导地位。到目前为止，这种情况还没有真正发生，但有很多人认为，特朗普对关税和更高赤字的关注可能标志着美元资产偏好的巨变。在本期节目中，我们将与 Alliance Bernstein 公司的策略师 Inigo Fraser-Jenkins 谈论美元的未来走势。【原文：People talk all the time about the potential for huge turning points in history. And they’ve been talking about the possibility of the US losing its dominant position in the international financial order for some time. So far it hasn’t really happened, but there are plenty of people who think that the Trump’s focus on tariffs and higher deficits could mark a sea change in the appetite for dollar assets. In this episode we speak with Inigo Fraser-Jenkins, strategist at Alliance Bernstein, about s】

item.title: 德国私营部门在美国贸易截止日期前持续增长
item.description: 德国私营部门在 7 月份保持增长，这表明在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不断加强的关税威胁和对政府推动支出的乐观态度面前，德国经济仍有韧性。【原文：Germany’s private sector kept growing in July, a sign of resilience in the face of Donald Trump’s intensifying tariff threats and optimism over the government’s spending push.】

item.title: 英国允许近海风电场收取更高的电费
item.description: 英国将允许近海风电场开发商收取更高的电费，因为成本增加使英国更难实现减少排放和降低客户账单的双重目标。【原文：The UK will allow offshore wind farm developers to charge more for their power as mounting costs make it harder for the country to meet twin objectives of slashing emissions and customer bills.】

item.title: 软银支持的 InMobi 据称计划在印度首次公开募股 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由软银集团支持的移动广告平台 InMobi Pte 计划在印度进行首次公开募股，募集多达 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：InMobi Pte, a mobile advertising platform backed by SoftBank Group Corp., aims to raise as much as $1 billion in an initial public offering in India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国称巴基斯坦代表团将与特朗普政府会面
item.description: 美国国务院发言人塔米-布鲁斯（Tammy Bruce）表示，巴基斯坦代表团将与美国官员会面，以最终达成贸易协议。【原文：A delegation from Pakistan is set to meet US officials in an effort to finalize a trade deal, according to US State Department Spokesperson Tammy Bruce.】

item.title: 数字资产需求激增，加纳将向加密货币公司发放许可证
item.description: 加纳计划向加密货币平台发放许可证，因为当局希望获得收入，并对这个西非国家约数百万人使用的资产类别进行监管。【原文：Ghana plans to license crypto platforms as authorities seek to capture revenue as well as regulate an asset class used by about millions in the West African nation.】

item.title: 世界富豪无视中东纷争押注迪拜和阿布扎比
item.description: 在阿比路投资集团的迪拜办事处，来自世界各地的电话和电子邮件不断。【原文：At the Dubai offices of Abbey Road Investment Group, the phone calls and emails keep landing from around the world.】

item.title: 印度能源股在监管机构进行电力价格改革后暴跌
item.description: 印度最大的电力交易市场印度能源交易所有限公司（Indian Energy Exchange Ltd.）的股价在联邦电力监管机构决定各交易所同步定价后出现了有史以来最大的暴跌。【原文：Shares in Indian Energy Exchange Ltd., the country’s largest power trading bourse, tumbled the most on record following the federal power regulator’s decision to synchronize pricing across exchanges.】

item.title: 粗加工损失后，今冬英国天然气储存能力将下降
item.description: 今年冬天，英国最大的天然气储存设施将恢复生产，而不是储存燃料，这一转变使英国失去了应对潜在供应中断的重要缓冲手段。【原文：The UK’s top natural gas storage facility will be back to producing and not stockpiling fuel this winter, a shift that leaves the country without an important buffer against potential supply disruptions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚主要港口铁矿石出口量创历史新高
item.description: 6 月份，澳大利亚最大的散货出口码头铁矿石发货量创下历史新高，这表明海运供应充足，而中国的需求前景正日益令人担忧。【原文：Iron ore shipments from Australia’s largest bulk-export terminal swelled to a record in June, in a sign of ample seaborne supplies just as concerns mount about the outlook for Chinese demand.】

item.title: 沃达丰在德国经历长期下滑后开始止损
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）在德国这个最大的市场开始扭转持续下滑的趋势，此前激烈的竞争和监管法规的改变使该公司失去了数百万客户。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc is starting to reverse a steady decline in Germany, its largest market, after heavy competition and a regulatory change cost the company millions of customers.】

item.title: 关税协议引发全球反弹，日本 Topix 指数再创新高
item.description: 由于东京与美国达成的关税协议使全球贸易和日本经济的前景更加光明，Topix 股票指数攀升至去年夏天创下的纪录之上，并向新的高峰迈进。【原文：The Topix stock index climbed above last summer’s record to head for a fresh peak as Tokyo’s tariff deal with the US brightened the outlook for global trade and Japan’s economy.】

item.title: 道达尔在利润下降、债务增加的情况下仍坚持回购
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）维持了季度股票回购计划和今年的资本支出计划，尽管油价下跌拖累了利润，净债务也有所增加。【原文：TotalEnergies SE maintained plans for quarterly share buybacks and this year’s capital expenditure, even as lower oil prices weighed on profit and net debt increased.】

item.title: Leonteq 首席执行官寻求扭亏为盈，预计 2027 年股东将获得回报
item.description: 瑞士衍生品公司 Leonteq AG 在公布上半年利润低于预期后表示，作为战略改革的一部分，该公司将寻求在 2027 年之前将多余资本返还给股东。【原文：Swiss derivatives firm Leonteq AG said it would seek to return excess capital to shareholders by 2027 as part of a strategic revamp, after it posted first-half profit that missed estimates.】

item.title: 泰克将加拿大最大铜矿的寿命延长至 2046 年
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）将继续在其位于加拿大的高地山谷铜矿挖掘铜矿，直至 2046 年，为该项目增加约 18 年的寿命，以满足日益增长的金属需求。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd. will keep digging up copper at its Highland Valley mine in Canada until 2046, adding about 18 years of life to the project to feed growing demand for the metal.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：贸易前景乐观，英国股市有望再创新高
印度制造业采购经理人指数显示印度 7 月经济活动信号不一
item.description: 据汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，7 月份印度制造业活动有所增强，而服务业则出现了放缓迹象。【原文：India’s manufacturing activity strengthened in July, while the services sector showed signs of easing, according to a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: Vontobel 在经历了上半年的动荡后迎来了积极的客户流入
item.description: Vontobel Holding AG 在上半年实现了客户资金的净流入，地缘政治的不确定性和较低的利率导致利润下降。【原文：Vontobel Holding AG posted net inflows of client funds in the first half of the year, with profit driven lower by geopolitical uncertainty and lower interest rates.】

item.title: 意法半导体（STMicro）销售额与预期持平，汽车市场令人失望
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）第二季度的销售额符合分析师的预期，个人电子和工业部门收入的增长平衡了汽车芯片销售的疲软。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV sales in the second quarter were in line with analysts’ expectations, after weak car chip sales were balanced by higher revenues in its personal electronics and industrial divisions.】

item.title: 菲律宾将利用 GCash 出售 "一口价 "债券以吸引更多投资者
item.description: 据菲律宾财政局称，菲律宾正在利用移动钱包 GCash 出售小额政府证券，在筹集更多资金为债务再融资和不断增长的经济提供资金的同时，寻求扩大投资者基础。【原文：The Philippines is tapping mobile wallet GCash to sell small-denominated government securities, according to the Bureau of the Treasury, seeking to broaden the investor base as it raises more money to refinance debt and fund the growing economy.】

item.title: 亚洲美元债券反弹令收益率溢价创历史新低
item.description: 亚洲投资级美元债券的收益率溢价降至历史新低，贸易紧张局势的缓解和强劲的企业基本面刺激了更广泛的区域风险资产反弹。【原文：Yield premiums on Asian investment-grade dollar bonds dropped to a record low, joining a wider regional rally in risk assets spurred by easing trade tensions and strong corporate fundamentals.】

item.title: 由于美元疲软和关税压力，诺基亚上季度利润下降 29
item.description: 由于受到关税和美元疲软的影响，5G 设备制造商诺基亚公司第二季度调整后利润同比下降 29%。【原文：Nokia Oyj’s adjusted profit dropped 29% in the second quarter from a year earlier after the 5G equipment maker was hit by impact from tariffs and a weak US dollar.】

item.title: 中国 30 年期债券拍卖创 3 月以来最高收益率
item.description: 周四，中国 30 年期国债拍卖创下了 3 月份以来的最高收益率，原因是风险情绪有所改善，对进一步亏损的担忧冷却了对国债的需求。【原文：China’s 30-year government bond auction on Thursday drew its highest yield since March, as risk sentiment improved and concerns over further losses cooled demand for debt.】

item.title: 印度印度银行寻求筹资 35 亿美元
item.description: 印度印度银行有限公司（IndusInd Bank Ltd.）正在寻求筹集多达 3,000 亿卢比（35 亿美元）的资金，因为这家由亿万富翁 Hinduja 家族支持的印度贷款机构正试图摆脱涉嫌欺诈和一系列高管离职的影响。【原文：IndusInd Bank Ltd. is seeking to raise as much as 300 billion rupees ($3.5 billion) as the Indian lender backed by the billionaire Hinduja family seeks to navigate the fallout from a suspected fraud and a spate of senior executive departures.】

item.title: 高盛、Investec 认为 2025 年南非有三次降息空间
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South Africa’s tame inflation has created room for the central bank to cut interest rates at each of its three remaining meetings this year, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Investec Bank Ltd】

item.title: 特朗普关税问题悬而未决，欧洲央行将暂缓降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将在一年多来首次维持利率不变，因为它在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税对通胀的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to leave interest rates untouched for the first time in more than a year as it awaits clarity on what President Donald Trump’s tariffs will do to inflation.】

item.title: 电动汽车增长放缓，欧洲汽车销量创 10 个月最大降幅
item.description: 在 6 月份所有新车销量出现 10 个月来最大降幅之后，汽车制造商呼吁欧洲进一步刺激对电池动力汽车的需求。【原文：Automakers called for Europe to further stimulate demand for battery-powered vehicles after sales of all new cars fell in June by the most in 10 months.】

item.title: 博通 610 亿美元收购 VMware 遭欧盟法院质疑
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom Inc. ）以 610 亿美元收购 VMware 公司（VMware Inc.【原文：Broadcom Inc.’s $61 billion acquisition of VMware Inc. faces scrutiny from European Union judges, after a cloud computing group contested the bloc’s approval of one of the world’s biggest tech deals.】
